 Perceptor:

Perceptor arrived at the place where Macima and the others were, and 
said "Maxima, what 're you doing here?? why didn't you answered, 
Hydras com'link and who are those bots?????!!!"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> He saw the abomination that had wrecked over Scourge and wished not 
to
> go through that painful experience. Any power Maxima thought she had
> over him did not affect him, though, as his spark was endowed with
> powers of its own.
> 
> AzureBlade: I would be a fool to join you without a thought. Tell me
> of your goals. However, I must decline your offer. I am very content
> of the form I have now.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> >  Scourge began to walk forward, hoping she knew what she was 
talking
> about, 
> > one part of him told him to trust her, the other to be wary of her
> nature, and 
> > the last... he growled as he slowly entered the pool... 
> > 
> > Her crimson optics watched him obey her, the power was very
> appeasing as her 
> > optics flashed. 
> > Watching him enter the pool.  
> > 
> >  Suddenly the matrix within her began to glow as did scourges 
spark... 
> > Scourge began to glow soflty as he sank within it. 
> > 
> >  Her body arched slightly skyward, as her optics closed halfway, 
in
> a strange 
> > type of trance it seemed. The sensation rushing through her. A
> wicked grin 
> > appeared upon her face....  
> > 
> >   Scourge cried out as his body began to glow he curled up and 
tried to 
> > transform, but instead the armor plates began to fuse and soon a
> black egg like 
> > structure lay at the bottom of the pool, the matrix opened and the
> egg cracked 
> > and a small glowing ball shot out and flew right at Maxima... 
> > 
> >   Her form still arched, the matrix glowing as if to accept the 
ball of 
> > light.  
> > 
> >  The ball entered the matrix and the egg floated to the surface 
and
> more 
> > cracks spread across the black object... the matrix cooled and
> sealed as it did it 
> > let loose a blast of power to maxima... 
> > 
> >  Her body jolted & arched as she cried out... "uhhoh-AHHHHHH!!!!"
> (Think of 
> > Heavy Metal War episode when Megatron gets all of the powers of 
the 
> > Decepticons). 
> > 
> > The egg began to hatch and a single a pair of eyes peared out at 
her... 
> > 
> > The power surged through her of the Matrix, as her crimson optics
> opened & 
> > glowed brightly. Then her form stood tall as her glowing crimson
> optics looked 
> > at the dark egg.  
> > 
> >  The egg began to fall away as the figure stood, it was organic...
> but also 
> > machine... it growled and a low dark voice emerged. "Who... am I?"
> The figure 
> > stood and a werewolf like manbeast stood before her he had a thick
> black mane 
> > and in some places he had silver designs running over his body, 
and
> two blood 
> > red eyes... 
> >  
> > Her glowing crimson orbs gazed at him, as a wicked smirk 
appeared...
> "You... 
> > are Scourge.... reborn." she purred with a hint of evil in her 
voice. 
> > Her shimmering form stood there, watching the new reformat of 
Scourge. 
> > 
> >   He looked down at himself and he growled looking up at her... 
His
> clawed 
> > hands opened and closed... "Maxima...." He looked up at her and 
then
> clinching 
> > his fists looked back at her. "What do you wish of me..." 
> > 
> >   "Nothing .. for now," she grinned. "Rest. For when the time 
comes,
> we will 
> > make our mark upon our enemies." 
> > 
> > Her optics glanced over at Azureblade. "If you are with me, then
> reform in 
> > the pool. If you are against me, leave, never return & next we 
meet,
> I shall not 
> > be merciful." 
> > 
> >  Then her optics turned back to Scourge. He was indeed different.
> The new 
> > form befit him very well. 
> > She grinned.  
> > 
> >  He turned to her then looked back at Azureblade... he growled as
> his inner 
> > body boiled with hatred... suddenly his body changed and the 
wolfman
> changed 
> > the organics, and the mechanical parts changed and the form that
> loomed over 
> > Maxima and placed a clawed wing on her shoulder was a cross 
between
> a dragon and 
> > a venus flytrap... It nuzzled her cheek and looked at azure with a
> face mostly 
> > made of teeth... 
> > 
> >  She felt both easy & uneasy about Scourge. It stirred her though,
> both the 
> > fact that he would listen to her, her spark & Matrix glowed as one
> as she felt 
> > the power boil. There was a stirring that Scourge created... was
> difficult to 
> > tell, as it was more than one type of stirring. 
> > she only stood there & smirked wickedly, a soft laugh boiled. 
> > But as her form restored, with the help of the lagoon & the 
Matrix, her 
> > memories returned.. one especially of a kiss....  
> > 
> >  The beast turned and looked down at her. It grunted as if to say.
> "Whats 
> > wrong?" 
> > 
> > She hoped to gain Azureblade under to command. Not to command &
> rule, but 
> > just for the fun of it .... she didn't wish to best-
> > Her optics widened.. Hydras! It was he whom she was loyal to... it
> was he who 
> > had kissed her.. why though... her memories then gave her that
> window. It was 
> > of love. She dared to love?! It nearly sickened her. But then ...
> she knew 
> > why. Hydras... was the combined form of both Megatron & Galvatron.
> Of the one 
> > she both did truly love & hate. 
> > 
> >   "Our time will soon be at hand, Scourge," she stated simply. 
What she 
> > remembered, would only be to herself. 
> > 
> > She looked up at Scourge, her crimson optics gazing up at him. 
> > 
> >  the toothy face curled into a grin as he opened his great wings 
and
> let a 
> > jet of flame burst from his throat. 
> > 
> > She grinned, his excitement was comforting. 
> > She broke away from him for a moment, leapt into the lagoon. 
> > As she floated through the waters, it helped her to repair & 
restore
> her. 
> > As she resurfaced, she was repaired & restored. 
> > Stepping out of the waters on the opposite side of the waterfall,
> her form 
> > shimmering in the sunlight,
